8032     // _____(__NR_setlcid),
8033     // _____(__NR_getlcid),
8034        // GrP fixme need any special nocancel handling?
8035        GENXY(__NR_read_nocancel,     sys_read),
8036        GENX_(__NR_write_nocancel,    sys_write),
8037        GENXY(__NR_open_nocancel,     sys_open),
8038        GENXY(__NR_close_nocancel,    sys_close),
8039        GENXY(__NR_wait4_nocancel,    sys_wait4),   // 400
8040        MACXY(__NR_recvmsg_nocancel,  recvmsg),
8041        MACX_(__NR_sendmsg_nocancel,  sendmsg),
8042        MACXY(__NR_recvfrom_nocancel, recvfrom),
8043        MACXY(__NR_accept_nocancel,   accept),
8044        GENX_(__NR_msync_nocancel,    sys_msync),
8045        MACXY(__NR_fcntl_nocancel,    fcntl),
8046        GENX_(__NR_select_nocancel,   sys_select),
8047        GENX_(__NR_fsync_nocancel,    sys_fsync),
8048        MACX_(__NR_connect_nocancel,  connect),
8049     // _____(__NR_sigsuspend_nocancel),
8050        GENXY(__NR_readv_nocancel,    sys_readv),
8051        GENX_(__NR_writev_nocancel,   sys_writev),
8052        MACX_(__NR_sendto_nocancel,   sendto),
8053        GENXY(__NR_pread_nocancel,    sys_pread64),
8054        GENX_(__NR_pwrite_nocancel,   sys_pwrite64),
8055     // _____(__NR_waitid_nocancel),
8056        GENXY(__NR_poll_nocancel,     sys_poll),
8057     // _____(__NR_msgsnd_nocancel),
8058     // _____(__NR_msgrcv_nocancel),
8059        MACX_(__NR_sem_wait_nocancel, sem_wait), // 420
8060     // _____(__NR_aio_suspend_nocancel),
8061     // _____(__NR___sigwait_nocancel),
8062        MACX_(__NR___semwait_signal_nocancel, __semwait_signal), 
8063     // _____(__NR___mac_mount),
8064     // _____(__NR___mac_get_mount),
8065     // _____(__NR___mac_getfsstat),
8066     #if DARWIN_VERS >= DARWIN_10_6
8067        MACXY(__NR_fsgetpath, fsgetpath), 
8068        MACXY(__NR_audit_session_self, audit_session_self),
8069     // _____(__NR_audit_session_join),
8070     #endif
8071     
8072     // _____(__NR_MAXSYSCALL)
8073        MACX_(__NR_DARWIN_FAKE_SIGRETURN, FAKE_SIGRETURN)
8074     };
8075     
8076     
8077     // Mach traps use negative syscall numbers. 
8078     // Use ML_(mach_trap_table)[-mach_trap_number] .
8079     
8080     const SyscallTableEntry ML_(mach_trap_table)[] = {
8081        _____(VG_DARWIN_SYSCALL_CONSTRUCT_MACH(0)), 
8082        _____(VG_DARWIN_SYSCALL_CONSTRUCT_MACH(1)), 
8083        _____(VG_DARWIN_SYSCALL_CONSTRUCT_MACH(2)), 
8084        _____(VG_DARWIN_SYSCALL_CONSTRUCT_MACH(3)), 
8085        _____(VG_DARWIN_SYSCALL_CONSTRUCT_MACH(4)), 
8086        _____(VG_DARWIN_SYSCALL_CONSTRUCT_MACH(5)),

8198     
8199     
8200     // Machine-dependent traps have wacky syscall numbers, and use the Mach trap 
8201     // calling convention instead of the syscall convention.
8202     // Use ML_(mdep_trap_table)[syscallno - ML_(mdep_trap_base)] .
8203     
8204     #if defined(VGA_x86)
8205     const SyscallTableEntry ML_(mdep_trap_table)[] = {
8206        MACX_(__NR_thread_fast_set_cthread_self, thread_fast_set_cthread_self), 
8207     };
8208     #elif defined(VGA_amd64)
8209     const SyscallTableEntry ML_(mdep_trap_table)[] = {
8210        MACX_(__NR_thread_fast_set_cthread_self, thread_fast_set_cthread_self), 
8211     };
8212     #else
8213     #error unknown architecture
8214     #endif
8215     
8216     const UInt ML_(syscall_table_size) = 
8217                 sizeof(ML_(syscall_table)) / sizeof(ML_(syscall_table)[0]);
8218     
8219     const UInt ML_(mach_trap_table_size) = 
8220                 sizeof(ML_(mach_trap_table)) / sizeof(ML_(mach_trap_table)[0]);
8221     
8222     const UInt ML_(mdep_trap_table_size) = 
8223                 sizeof(ML_(mdep_trap_table)) / sizeof(ML_(mdep_trap_table)[0]);
8224     
8225     #endif // defined(VGO_darwin)
8226     
8227     /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
8228     /*--- end                                                          ---*/
8229     /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
8230
